programme.title: The Swindlers
programme.desc: Though each has their own motives, unlikely individuals from different sides of the law allies together to achieve a common goal - trapping the worlds most legendary con man.

programme.title: Officer of the Year
programme.desc: The competition to see who makes the most arrests heats up between two cops from rival stations when theyre forced to work together to catch a criminal.

programme.title: Decision to Leave
programme.desc: When detective Hae-Joon investigates the death of a man who fell from a mountaintop and meets his wife Seo-rae, he starts to suspect her at the same time that he begins feeling an attraction to her.

programme.title: The Con Artists
programme.desc: A wily safecracker is forced to help a mob boss pull off a $150 million heist, but smells a double-cross in the works.

programme.title: Ordinary Person
programme.desc: Sung-jin is a police officer involved in a conspiracy after he arrested a suspected murderer by chance. Gyu-nam make use of Sung-jins weakness, his family, to strike a deal with him.

programme.title: The Hot-blooded
programme.desc: 4 friends gave up on Taekwondo and part ways after being asked to lose on purpose in a trial. Years later, they decided to take on a local gang realizing their hometown is threatened.

programme.title: Hijack 1971
programme.desc: Detonation of an explosive device causes terror in the flight and pilot Gyu-Sik loses sight in one eye. Yong-dae who hatched the hijacking plot, threatens to take the plane to North Korea.

programme.title: In Our Prime
programme.desc: Genius Mathematician defected from the North tried to hide his past eventually started teaching a student who gave up on Maths the right way to find the answer.

programme.title: Single in Seoul
programme.desc: Yeong-Ho is a famous influencer who praises living a single life. Hyeon-Jin is an editor who is desperate about finding her partner. The two meets while working together for a book.

programme.title: Sinkhole
programme.desc: As the family celebrates their purchases of a new condo after 11 years of effort, the building was engulfed in a sinkhole due to heavy downpour.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E061
programme.desc: Victoria revela a Nicols que el tena razon sobre Jack Builder, pues el hombre resulto ser quien planeo todo el atentado; la joven Guanipa admite que si no fuera por ell ella hubiera terminado convenciendose de que el actor era el hombre de quien deba enamorarse. Antonieta cita a Jons para decirle algo importante; el joven, temiendo lo que su novia quiere decirle, le recuerda lo mucho que la ama y que su mayor interes es hacerla feliz. Eugenia se molesta al darse cuenta de que Yosmir tena razon respecto a las intenciones de Miguelito con ella; la jovencita asegura al muchacho que no quiere nada con el, pero Miguelito no est dispuesto a desistir. Hilario cumple su promesa y se presenta en la cena romntica acordada con Adelaida, a quien besa con pasion antes de prometerle que todas las noches de su vida sern para ella.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E062 - Episodio 62
programme.desc: Florencia se pregunta si Hilario se referira tambien a ella cuando dijo que no podan entrar a Cantarrana; Nicols indaga que la hizo cambiar de opinion porque, hasta donde el tena entendido, su intencion era justamente esa. Clementina est feliz porque Carmencita acepto hospedarla en su casa ahora que sus padres decidieron irse a vivir a la playa. Victoria quiere que Hansen la acompae a Cantarrana para que se olvide de la tristeza que lo embarga por ese misterioso amor que nadie conoce; el seor, aunque se niega a viajar, le presta su avioneta para que ella lo haga. Antonieta propone a Jons adelantar el matrimonio. Leopoldo ratifica su decision de no aparecer ante su familia porque cree que el hecho de que Fernanda este en esas tierras significa que su supuesta muerte est ayudando a que se acabe el odio que le impeda regresar a ese lugar.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E71
programme.desc: Como parte de su plan Camila ha cambiado, tanto fsica como de actitud. As se presenta ante todos. Max y Astrid continan su romance; sin embargo, no cesa de recordar a Camila deseando saber todas las verdades que Astrid y Marcelina ocultan.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E72
programme.desc: Solamente la Madre Isabel es convencida de la noble actitud de su muchacha que desistio de las intenciones de cobrar la traicion de las tres mujeres y hasta les pidio perdon. Ezequiel cuenta a Camila lo del compromiso de su hijo y esta le reprocha a que fuera tan rpido, olvidando el gran amor que deca tenerle.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E91
programme.desc: After Pastora fell asleep, Elisenda advises Raul not to let his private life go down with that of Lara Portillo.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E92
programme.desc: Illis asks Cirilo if Clara Ines is his daughter.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E91
programme.desc: Lorena confesses to Omar that Claudio and Gertrudis hired Pedro Lobo to send Guillermo to kill Marco Aurelio. Lorena goes to meet Claudio, who makes a pact with her to get rid of the murder accusation together, since Gertrudis wants to send them to jail and to make her look innocent before everyone, especially Alberto, of any guilt.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E68
programme.desc: Carlos Ral avisa a Adriana que, en vista de que ninguno es lo suficientemente valiente para defender su amor, ha decidido alejarse de ella para siempre.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E69
programme.desc: Azalea hace otra de sus escenas cuando Adriana se dispone a acompaar a la familia al cementerio; la seora le recuerda a Salvatore que debe decidir entre la chef y ella.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E062 - Episodio 62
programme.desc: Florencia se pregunta si Hilario se referira tambien a ella cuando dijo que no podan entrar a Cantarrana; Nicols indaga que la hizo cambiar de opinion porque, hasta donde el tena entendido, su intencion era justamente esa. Clementina est feliz porque Carmencita acepto hospedarla en su casa ahora que sus padres decidieron irse a vivir a la playa. Victoria quiere que Hansen la acompae a Cantarrana para que se olvide de la tristeza que lo embarga por ese misterioso amor que nadie conoce; el seor, aunque se niega a viajar, le presta su avioneta para que ella lo haga. Antonieta propone a Jons adelantar el matrimonio. Leopoldo ratifica su decision de no aparecer ante su familia porque cree que el hecho de que Fernanda este en esas tierras significa que su supuesta muerte est ayudando a que se acabe el odio que le impeda regresar a ese lugar.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E063
programme.desc: Hilario se sorprende cuando al cavar la tumba descubre que el cadver de Rosendo ya no se encuentra en el lugar; Fernanda y Nicols tambien se desconciertan porque se supone que ah iban a encontrar el cuerpo de Leopoldo. Yosmir y Chabeto estn frente a la casa de Eugenia cuando el cantante del grupo musical les avisa que no va a poder ir a dar la serenata a la muchacha. Victoria le da una bofetada a Nicols cuando el asegura que no puede sentir nada por la mujer que mato a su querido to; la joven le exige que se marche cuanto antes de su casa y le manda a decir a Florencia que se aleje lo mas que pueda de su padre y de ella. Leopoldo asegura a Marisa que no est muy seguro de que haya sido Victoria quien le disparo porque las imgenes de lo ocurrido todava estn muy confusas en su mente; sin embargo, de lo que s est seguro, es que si la guerra entre los Guanipa y los De Casal vuelve a comenzar, el tendr que aparecer de nuevo.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E72
programme.desc: Solamente la Madre Isabel es convencida de la noble actitud de su muchacha que desistio de las intenciones de cobrar la traicion de las tres mujeres y hasta les pidio perdon. Ezequiel cuenta a Camila lo del compromiso de su hijo y esta le reprocha a que fuera tan rpido, olvidando el gran amor que deca tenerle.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E73
programme.desc: Fausto con doble intencion invita a Camila a cenar en su casa para que se relacione con su nueva familia. Ezequiel insiste en hablarle de romance y sentimientos y la joven le recuerda que no fue eso lo que pactaron. Marcelina visita a Ezequiel en el hospital y este aprovecha para amenazarla si vuelve a intentar hacerle dao a Camila.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E92
programme.desc: Illis asks Cirilo if Clara Ines is his daughter.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E93
programme.desc: Illis reveals to Clara Ines that it was Cirilo who verified that she was his daughter; Clara and her mother seal their longed-for reunion with an embrace.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E92
programme.desc: Alberto assures Alfonso that he will not forgive Gertrudis, he made a pact with his mother just to help him get revenge on Claudio and Lorena; but he swears on Marco Aurelios grave that he will also make her pay, as he knows she is also guilty. Judge Trejo almost discovers Paulina and her children talking about the loss of the million dollars and wants to know the reason for the family meeting without him being present - Maria Lourdes accepts Gertrudis bribe and Gertrudis gives him the gun that Lorena supposedly used to shoot and kill Marco Aurelio.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E93
programme.desc: When Gertrudis goes to tell Claudio everything she agreed with Mara Lourdes, he reiterates that he plans to escape because he is not willing to go to jail - Virginia gets upset when she sees Elvis taking Mara ngeles to visit Gael - Alberto continues verbally attacking Lorena, when suddenly Omar arrives with other policemen to take her into custody.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E70
programme.desc: Cesar le exige a Adriana que le diga si se caso con el enamorada o no.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E063

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E064
programme.desc: Hilario asegura a Moncho que piensa asistir a la cita que le hicieron a Florencia para enfrentar a esa persona misteriosa que se ha atrevido a esconderse de el en sus propias tierras. Leopoldo pide a Marisa averigue todo lo que este pasando entre su familia y los Guanipa, pues necesita estar informado al respecto. Nicols avisa a Victoria y a Adelaida que Hilario est herido, pero ya fue llevado al hospital; Victoria est convencida de que fue la familia del joven Del Casal quienes lo atacaron a pesar de que Nicols asegura que no es as. Florencia les revela a Victoria, Adelaida y Nicols que Hilario le dijo que fue Zambrano, su antiguo capataz, quien lo hirio; adems, la joven Zapata informa a Victoria que Hilario estaba en su casa porque quera saber si la persona que la haba citado a ella era la misma que se llevo el cadver de Rosendo del lugar donde el -Hilario- lo haba enterrado.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E73
programme.desc: Fausto con doble intencion invita a Camila a cenar en su casa para que se relacione con su nueva familia. Ezequiel insiste en hablarle de romance y sentimientos y la joven le recuerda que no fue eso lo que pactaron. Marcelina visita a Ezequiel en el hospital y este aprovecha para amenazarla si vuelve a intentar hacerle dao a Camila.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E74
programme.desc: Camila est alerta sobre la evidente hipocresa de Fausto y Patricia, sin embargo, logra salir airosa de las incesantes preguntas manteniendose firme en su estrategia de traer la paz a las dos familias. Inconvenientes, con Roger y con Gregorio se los cuenta a Ezequiel que le promete que podr cobrarse todo lo que le han hecho.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E93
programme.desc: Illis reveals to Clara Ines that it was Cirilo who verified that she was his daughter; Clara and her mother seal their longed-for reunion with an embrace.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E94
programme.desc: Bernice agrees to take Tirso to a man that Pastora assures her will turn her beloved into a gentleman.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E93
programme.desc: When Gertrudis goes to tell Claudio everything she agreed with Mara Lourdes, he reiterates that he plans to escape because he is not willing to go to jail - Virginia gets upset when she sees Elvis taking Mara ngeles to visit Gael - Alberto continues verbally attacking Lorena, when suddenly Omar arrives with other policemen to take her into custody.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E94
programme.desc: Lorena will be arrested because they found the gun with which Marco Aurelio was murdered and it has her fingerprints on it. Claudio refuses to go to jail to save Gertrudis; he prefers to flee. Claudio is about to leave the hotel where he has been hiding, when the police suddenly appear to take him into custody.

Yosmir y Chabeto estn frente a la casa de Eugenia cuando el cantante del grupo musical les avisa que no va a poder ir a dar la serenata a la muchacha. Victoria le da una bofetada a Nicols cuando el asegura que no puede sentir nada por la mujer que mato a su querido to; la joven le exige que se marche cuanto antes de su casa y le manda a decir a Florencia que se aleje lo mas que pueda de su padre y de ella. Leopoldo asegura a Marisa que no est muy seguro de que haya sido Victoria quien le disparo porque las imgenes de lo ocurrido todava estn muy confusas en su mente; sin embargo, de lo que s est seguro, es que si la guerra entre los Guanipa y los De Casal vuelve a comenzar, el tendr que aparecer de nuevo.

programme.title: Wardens - S01:E11 - Operation Interstate Game Check
programme.desc: In this episode the Wardens set up a game checkpoint to make sure everyone is following the rules.

programme.title: Wardens - S01:E12 - Operation Chuck Coal

programme.desc: On a rare day off, Josiah and his friends white water raft where few have gone before - on top of the massive Knik Glacier.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E06 - Princess Dianas Legacy
programme.desc: Reflecting on Dianas legacy, this show delves into what Princess Diana left behind after her sudden passing - the impression she left on her children, the royal family, and the people who loved her. The young princes drew admiration with their demeanor at her funeral, but many questioned how their bond with Prince Charles would be moving forward.

programme.title: Dropped - S04:E04 - Cloudy Days

Meanwhile, Casey and R.L. feast on salmon, getting some much-needed protein. Huge storm clouds are pouring over Alaska.

programme.title: Wild Ones - S01:E10 - Micro Predators
programme.desc: They may be small but dont be fooled - micro predators can be deadly. From the impressive serial killer Portia spider to the hundreds of species of ants and the archerfish with its precision firing of water droplets to secure its prey Wild Ones peers through the microscope to uncover their true lethality.

programme.title: Wild Ones - S01:E11 - Most Poisonous_
programme.desc: You wouldnt want to be bitten by any of these but which one has the deadliest poison? The venom from the most poisonous snake on the planet? A rare poisonous lizard? Or is it the blue ringed octopus?

programme.title: Wild Ones - S01:E12 - Migration
programme.desc: Animals, big and not so big, traverse hundreds of miles some in search of food, others to find ideal breeding grounds. From Zebras crossing the savannahs of Africa to the huge journeys undertaken by turtles to find the perfect beach to lay their eggs the annual and often dangerous journeys are simply mind boggling.

programme.title: Wild Ones - S01:E13 - Who is the King?
programme.desc: It is estimated that there are approximately 8.7 million different species of animals on Earth. Each has developed unique, specific and often deadly survival techniques and skills for survival. How do we choose a favourite from such a vast array of spectacular and beautiful creatures?

programme.title: Three Dates to Forever
programme.desc: Maddie Mckenzie is a hard-working presenter whose drive and talent has made her a popular radio host. John Reed is a carefree tech entrepreneur whos more interested in hosting parties. The two couldnt be more different.

programme.title: Love for Starters
programme.desc: To save her fathers lake-front restaurant, a talented interior designer must partner with the celebrity chef her father hired without her knowledge to revamp the place before time runs out.

programme.title: Mr. Pawsitively Perfect
programme.desc: An aspiring marketing designers favorite foster dog is adopted by a famous but down on his luck furniture designer, whom she fears only wants the dog for his new image.

programme.title: Snowkissed
programme.desc: A travel-averse journalist chases her dream assignment, where she soon finds herself mentoring a handsome BAndB owner who wants to be a tour guide.

programme.desc: An aspiring marketing designers favorite foster dog is adopted by a famous but down on his luck furniture designer, whom she fears only wants the dog for his new image.

programme.title: Two Chefs and a Wedding Cake
programme.desc: It follows a food critic at the top of her game as she meets a chef renowned for refusing food critics to his restaurant. They must overcome their differences before her sisters wedding

programme.title: InstaFame
programme.desc: Since her divorce, Gwen and her teenage daughter Maddie make a great team and tell each other everything. Its Maddies senior year and shes excited to be reunited with her besties Kelly and Lacey again. Eager to be the coolest girls at school, the perfect way to gain instant popularity is posting selfies! When one of their social media stunts goes wrong, Maddie is blamed and the consequences are deadly. But Gwen knows shes innocent. Shes determined to prove it and to protect her daughter from the real killer

programme.title: Killer Cover Up
programme.desc: All-star soccer player Jenna Sims and her mom Sally are ready for a new start when they move to a new, sunny beach town. But when other members of her new soccer team start turning up dead and one ends up in a coma, Jenna finds herself accused of the crime.

programme.title: Killer Queen Bee
programme.desc: Dylan is transferred to a new school after her mom is put in a rehabilitation center for pain pill abuse. After a run in with high school mean girl Tiffany, soon Tiffany is plotting to make Dylans life a living hell.

programme.title: Kidnapped to the Island
programme.desc: When a star-struck teenager with a desire to make it as a pop star disappears, her concerned single mom sets out to rescue her from the controlling singer who lured her to a faraway island with promises of fame and fortune.

programme.title: Danger Rocks the Cradle
programme.desc: Nicolette, a high school senior has bounced around from foster home to home. She started feeling hopeless when found herself pregnant by the school quarterback.

programme.title: Love on the Reef
programme.desc: A smart and serious marine biologist and a fun-loving and laissez-faire dive instructor must team up to save their beloved reef from being destroyed before its too late.

programme.desc: Nicolette, a high school senior has bounced around from foster home to home. She started feeling hopeless when found herself pregnant by the school quarterback.

programme.title: Sister Dating Swap
programme.desc: When sisters Helena and Rachel are fed up with their love and work life, they agree to swap homes for 2 weeks. Yet what starts out as a holiday grows into a whole new perspective on their careers, life and most importantly, romance.

programme.title: Home for a Royal Heart
programme.desc: When the seaside town of Shaw Bay is under threat of a redevelopment, realtor Erin will do anything to save it. Cue the handsome Theo, a royal looking for a new property. The catch is, hes hiding the royal part.

programme.title: Been There All Along
programme.desc: After her public breakup, Charley, determined founder of a dating app, is near bankruptcy and teamed up with Liam, a self-assured and innovative marketing expert, to save her company.

programme.title: Rear View Mirror
programme.desc: A young mother tries to escape her abusive, controlling husband and start a new life in an idyllic, peaceful beach town.

programme.title: Here Kills the Bride
programme.desc: Inspired by the Highly Acclaimed Thriller - The Perfect Bride Jessica is shocked to find out that her brother, Carlos, is getting married in a week to Grace, a girl he just met in a strip club, something he would never regularly do. Determined to find out the real reasons behind the marriage, Jessica gets pulled into a whirlwind of events, putting her own life at risk. Is Carlos in trouble? Or is Grace a victim?
